title: 'Let me see your boarding pass': Karen tries to steal passenger's seat and make him sit in her middle seat for 100% full 3 hour flight
description: The worst part about traveling during the holiday season is having to deal with other travelers. Whether it's a bus, train, or plane, having to share a confined space with strangers just so you can endure passive-aggressive meals with family members you love to avoid year-round often feels like a lot of effort for very little reward. However, that's what happens to countless folks every December, which means that nearly every traveler is at least slightly annoyed already. Here, we have one of those passengers who boarded his flight home, only to discover an entitled Karen sitting in his seat. Of course, she was assigned the middle seat on a 100% full, 3+ hour flight, and she genuinely thought this guy would be willing to switch with her. Thankfully, he had enough sense to stand up for himself, an act of defiance that led to a full 10 minutes of drama involving the flight attendant and several onlookers.Keep scrolling below for the full story and for the best reactions from folks in the comments section. For more stories like this, check out this post about an HOA president who got his own comeuppance.
author: BenWeiss
